newsitem.title: USA: U.S., Japan manufacturers seek stable yen/dlr rate.
newsitem.headline: U.S., Japan manufacturers seek stable yen/dlr rate.

text.p: Ford Motor Co Vice Chairman Wayne Booker said on Tuesday U.S. and Japanese manufacturing executives meeting here agreed on the need for a stable yen-dollar exchange rate.
Booker, co-chair of the manufacturing group of a U.S.-Japan business conference, said the manufacturers discussed exchange rate issues during a closed-door meeting in San Francisco.
"Generally we reached consensus on the need for stability in the yen-dollar relationship and no major fluctuations," Booker told reporters.
